票.definition: ticket; ballot; banknote; CL:張|张[zhang1]; person held for ransom; amateur performance of Chinese opera; classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

票卡.definition: machine-readable card that serves as a ticket (Tw)

票友.definition: an amateur actor (e.g. in Chinese opera)

票友兒.definition: an amateur actor (e.g. in Chinese opera)

票據.definition: negotiable instrument (draft, note etc); voucher; receipt

票活.definition: to work as amateur for no pay

票莊.definition: money shop (ancient form of banking business)

票證.definition: a ticket; a pass (e.g. to enter a building)

票面值.definition: par value; face value (of a bond)
